name: That Night (Rikogamez)
description:
Game time : around 3 minutes.

That Night is a short PSX horror game. You're a girl in the 90's that one night decided to take a walk in a road in the middle of the forest. The more you progress, the more you hear voices of something that is following you.

(For a better experience, use headphones).

Controls :

MouseLookW, A, S, DMoveFFlashlight

This is the first horror game I create so it might not be that scary or complete, I hope you enjoy it and I'd love to hear your feedbacks :)

Credits:

Sounds from Freesound
